channel.title: Friends foes? enemys? hate?
channel.description:
there is plenty of hate in this world and i know alot of you hate you'r parents and you'r kin folks but trust me love them all you can because you wont have them forever and when they die you will feel sorry trust me i hated i HATED my brother to death and he crashed his car and he died on impact i've never been the same since so trust me spend all the time with loved ones as you can i'm not saying don't hate cause i hate alot of people ;) but love you'r close because you wont have them forever and you'r most likely to live longer then them and they'll die and you'll be alone so love you'r loved ones and you will not be in pain when they die i mean you will but it wont be as bad cause you know that they knew you loved them i never got to say i was sorry to my brother when he wrecked and as a matter of fact we was in a fight when he left and he wrecked into a pole and it killed him on impact and they never know that you was sorry and you never got to say i'm sorry for how i treated you trust me on this one
[b]this was in a newspaper article in my paper it was in the hobituary under the boys death and i want to say that this is true (not written by me) i say fuck my parents lol but the family makes a point..[/b]
[scar]you don't know what you got till you lose it[/scar]

item.title: Friends foes? enemys? hate?
item.dc:creator: @zsakul2 zsakul2
item.description:
@zsakul2 wrote:

there is plenty of hate in this world and i know alot of you hate you’r parents and you’r kin folks but trust me love them all you can because you wont have them forever and when they die you will feel sorry trust me i hated i HATED my brother to death and he crashed his car and he died on impact i’ve never been the same since so trust me spend all the time with loved ones as you can i’m not saying don’t hate cause i hate alot of people but love you’r close because you wont have them forever and you’r most likely to live longer then them and they’ll die and you’ll be alone so love you’r loved ones and you will not be in pain when they die i mean you will but it wont be as bad cause you know that they knew you loved them i never got to say i was sorry to my brother when he wrecked and as a matter of fact we was in a fight when he left and he wrecked into a pole and it killed him on impact and they never know that you was sorry and you never got to say i’m sorry for how i treated you trust me on this one

this was in a newspaper article in my paper it was in the hobituary under the boys death and i want to say that this is true (not written by me) i say fuck my parents lol but the family makes a point…

[scar]you don’t know what you got till you lose it[/scar]
